title: i cant buy rp
body: what to do if i cant buy rp when i write my credit card number expiry date and when i write my card holder it shows me error that this card is expired but it will be expired in 2020 can some 1 help me?

replies.body: Hey that's strange!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in this case, and our billing team can check this out with you privately to see what's going on.
